projects.title: Maine State Board of Education
projects.description: Ryan Hafener serves as one of two student representatives to the Maine State Board of Education. His focus on the Board is to advocate for all students in Maine.

projects.title: Googe Play Change the Game
projects.description: The Google Play Change the Game Design Challenge invited youth from around the country to submit innovative mobile game ideas and selected the top innovators in the country to join the Change the Game Class of 2021. Ryan was a part of the Class of 2021 and had the opportunity to participate in a Girls Make Games mobile gaming workshop and a year-long Mentorship Program hosted by The Game Awards. He credits working with his mentor from the Future Class of TGA as an incredible and eye-opening experience to learn more about a future the game industry.
